SYSTEM: ResearchPlan2014_slides.pdf: Página 6
Alejandro Llaves - Research Plan 2014
6
Research goals
September 2014
●A RDF streaming engine that scales to higher input data 
rates and/or more complex queries and/or more concurrent 
queries
●Deliverable describing such engine and the research behind 
it for PlanetData 
December 2014
●Improvements on the engine based on application purpose
●Journal paper
speaker: SYSTEM
